00071 class sbwSignatureByte : public sbwSignatureType  
00072 {
00073 public:
00079         DataBlockType getType() { return ByteType; }
00080 
00086         void write(DataBlockWriter writer, va_list &ap)
00087         {
00088                 // The C++ C99 standard requires that "the type used in va_arg is
00089                 // supposed to match the actual type **after default promotions**."
00090 
00091                 unsigned char x = va_arg(ap, int /* unsigned char */);
00092 
00093                 writer << x ;
00094         }
00095 
00102         void read(DataBlockReader reader, va_list &ap)
00103         {
00104                 unsigned char *x = va_arg(ap, unsigned char *);
00105 
00106                 reader.getForC(*x) ;
00107         }
00108 
00115         void write1DArray(DataBlockWriter writer, Integer size, va_list &ap)
00116         {
00117                 unsigned char *x = va_arg(ap, unsigned char *);
00118 
00119                 writer.add(size, x);
00120         }
00121 
00130         void read1DArray(DataBlockReader reader, Integer &size, va_list &ap)
00131         {
00132                 unsigned char **x = va_arg(ap, unsigned char **);
00133 
00134                 reader.getForC(size, *x);
00135         }
00136 
00145         void write2DArray(DataBlockWriter writer, Integer xsize, Integer ysize, va_list &ap)
00146         {
00147                 unsigned char **x = va_arg(ap, unsigned char **);
00148 
00149                 writer.add(xsize, ysize, x);
00150         }
00151 
00161         void read2DArray(DataBlockReader reader, Integer &xsize, Integer &ysize, va_list &ap)
00162         {
00163                 unsigned char ***x = va_arg(ap, unsigned char ***);
00164 
00165                 reader.getForC(xsize, ysize, *x);
00166         }
00167 };
